DOC.brief_summary: Long term results after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation for uncontrolled glaucoma are retrospectively examined.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Outcome After Ahmed Glaucoma Valve
DOC.detailed_description: The development of intraocular pressure, visual acuity, number of glaucoma medication, number of complications and necessity of revision operations after Ahmed glaucoma valve implantation for uncontrolled glaucoma is examined yearly for a period of 4 years.
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from medically uncontrolled glaucoma Informed consent healthy subjects under 18 years
